column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The go-to for deep dish in Chicago. It isn't the fanciest or the weirdest or the trendiest
column3: this is the epitome of Chicago deep dish
column4: with the chunky tomato sauce on top of the cheese. Ask for the Butter Crust to get the full experience. Keep it classic with sausage (a single patty that covers the full pie) or branch out with "the Lou
column5: a great take on a veggie 'za.
